jellyctf{jelly_your_homework_was_due_yesterday}
(0,0,100,011,111,110) (0,0,4,3,7,6) corresponds to how many are of each length
(_,e,l,y,j,o,r,a,c,d,s,t,u,w,f,h,k,m,{,})
4
000 _
001 e
010 l
011 y
3
1000 j
1001 o
1010 r
7
10110 a
10111 c
11000 d
11001 s
11010 t
11011 u 
11100 w
6
111010 f
111011 h
111100 k
111101 m
111110 {
111111 }
